articles.title: What is React Help Desk?
articles.body: React Help Desk is a set of React components using TailwindCSS and TypeScript designed to be the building blocks of a help desk and self-support system for web apps.

articles.title: What do I do if I don't know what to do?
What widgets are available?
articles.body:
Right now, there is an FAQ tab and a Tutorials tab.

The FAQ tab accepts an object of categories and/or articles that are shown in a collapsible, searchable view.

The Tutorials tab has of now been made so that it supports video tutorials or whatever you might feel like to replace it with.

articles.title: What is live chat?
articles.body: Live chat is a feature that allows you to chat with a support agent in real-time. There a many ways to implement this. Google live chat and se apps from Zendesk, LiveChat, LiveAgent and many more.
